plot: Drama about the last day of publication of a newspaper hit by financial woes and union demands. Both the staffers and the community feel its impending loss.
title: This Town Will Never Be the Same
plot_es: Drama about the last day of publication of a newspaper hit by financial woes and union demands. Both the staffers and the community feel its impending loss.
original_name: This Town Will Never Be the Same
plot_en: Drama about the last day of publication of a newspaper hit by financial woes and union demands. Both the staffers and the community feel its impending loss.
